projects.name: Angular SaaS Healthcare Project
projects.description: A SaaS Healthcare Project utilizing the Angular framework for the frontend. Designed for scalability and efficiency, ensuring secure and responsive performance for healthcare services.

projects.name: Minebier.dk: Smart Beehive Monitoring for Beekeepers
projects.description:
Challenges
Minebier.dk is designed to help beekeepers monitor honey levels in their beehives with real-time tracking. The goal was to provide an intuitive and data-driven platform that enables users to track beehive weight, temperature, and overall hive conditions.

projects.name: LMS for Math Courses
projects.description: An LMS built with Angular, focusing on optimizing RxJS streams for better performance. The platform offers a seamless learning experience with Firebase integration.

projects.name: Angular Application with OAuth
projects.description: A dashboard application built with Angular, featuring OAuth authentication, MongoDB, and Express.js for secure and efficient data management.

projects.name: Application for Vispo
projects.description: A collaboration platform for investors and founders, developed using the MEAN stack with Angular and RxJS. Ensures smooth interactions with a responsive UI powered by Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: Application for Advertising & Retail Media
projects.description: Built with Angular, TypeScript, and RxJS, this advertising platform integrates sponsored offers, display ads, and native promotions into e-commerce stores.
